bef5e5d0bf174db8ae5bcf482a86a6bd.description: Filter rule to test if # of Notification email bounce errors exceeds the threshold in System Health Notifications Dashboard

_Interval.description: The frequency of the check in minutes. (1 ~ 1440)

_Window.description: The rolling window of time the data should be checked for. (in minutes, 3 ~ 1440)

_Threshold.description: The value above which notifications should be sent out. (If ThresholdType is Number, value will be number of requests. If ThresholdType is Percentage, value will be percentage of total email notifications [0, 100])

_MuteActive.description: Indicates whether the mute notification is enabled.

_MuteLimit.description: The number of times this notification will trigger before it is muted. (1 ~ 100)

_MuteHour.description: The duration (in hours) for which this notification will be muted. (1 ~ 100)

ae9e731bb6a64bd4bb6e9696e1e6918d.description: Filter rule to test if # of Tax Vendor errors exceeds the threshold in System Health Tax Integration Dashboard
ae9e731bb6a64bd4bb6e9696e1e6918d.condition: TelemetryTaxVendorFailures.Window <= _Window && ((TelemetryTaxVendorFailures.ThresholdType == _ThresholdType && TelemetryTaxVendorFailures.ThresholdType == 'Number' && TelemetryTaxVendorFailures.NumberOfErrors >= _Threshold) or (TelemetryTaxVendorFailures.ThresholdType == _ThresholdType && TelemetryTaxVendorFailures.ThresholdType == 'Percentage' && TelemetryTaxVendorFailures.NumberOfErrors >= _Threshold * 0.01 * TelemetryTaxVendorFailures.Total))

_Interval.description: The frequency of the check in minutes. (1 ~ 1440)

_Window.description: The rolling window of time the data should be checked for. (in minutes, 3 ~ 1440)

_Threshold.description: The value above which notifications should be sent out. (If ThresholdType is Number, value will be number of vendor failures. If ThresholdType is Percentage, value will be percentage of total. [0, 100])

_MuteActive.description: Indicates whether the mute notification is enabled.

_MuteLimit.description: The number of times this notification will trigger before it is muted. (1 ~ 100)

_MuteHour.description: The duration (in hours) for which this notification will be muted. (1 ~ 100)
